alert.note: Alert for Baltimore; Baltimore City (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 04 at 6:04PM EDT until August 04 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sterling Virginia has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... West Central Baltimore County in northern Maryland... Baltimore City in northern Maryland... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 604 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. The expected rainfall rate is 1 to 3 inches in 1 hour. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Baltimore... Pikesville... Middle River... Dundalk... Towson... Catonsville... Essex... Woodlawn... Parkville... Carney... Milford Mill... Perry Hall... Lochearn... Rosedale... Rossville... White Marsh... Edgemere... Loch Raven Village... Fullerton... Nottingham... FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE EXPECTED RAINFALL RATE...1-3 INCHES IN 1 HOUR
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
